function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of secure health record database","Impact":"Increased risk of misdiagnosis due to incomplete or inaccurate patient information.","Mitigation":"Implement a secure and reliable database for health records with strict privacy and security measures, such as encryption and access control.","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for secure and immutable health record management.","People":"Patients, medical professionals, and healthcare institutions.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health agencies."},{"Description":"Shortage of personal protective equipment (PPE)","Impact":"Increased risk of infection among frontline health responders and patients due to lack of adequate PPE.","Mitigation":"Implement a system for efficient supply chain management and distribution of PPE, using blockchain technology for transparency and traceability.","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for supply chain management and tracking of PPE.","People":"Frontline health responders, patients, healthcare institutions.","Owner":"Government health agencies, PPE suppliers and manufacturers."},{"Description":"Inefficient healthcare management system","Impact":"Inability to effectively handle and respond to large-scale health crises like COVID-19, leading to overwhelmed healthcare systems and higher mortality rates.","Mitigation":"Implement a well-designed and efficient healthcare management system to optimize resource allocation, patient tracking, and crisis response.","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for healthcare management and real-time patient tracking.","People":"Patients, medical professionals, healthcare administrators.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health agencies."}]}
